title: Kicked out of my invisible game...

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: What's happening? Anyone else had this problem? Literally just disconnected my entire team and the game vanished. ~ Sorry I double posted on boards, just really looking for an answer!

replies.body: It happens rather rarely, but basically what happened was the game crashed on the server which explains why nobody can reconnect. The game simply no longer exists! Nobody will get any penalties or punishments, so no worries there.
